title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing the Prophet’s wives in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of seeing the Prophet’s wives in a dream. Many people are searching for what seeing the Prophet’s wives brings, so in the following lines we present an interpretation of the dream of seeing the Prophet’s wives in a dream..Interpretation of the dream of seeing the Prophet’s wives in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the Prophet’s wives in a dream may be a reference to mothers, and God knows best. When The dreamer sees the Messenger’s wives can express an abundance of offspring, and God knows the unseen. Seeing the Messenger’s wives may indicate goodness and sustenance, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a married man sees the Messenger’s wives, this indicates goodness and blessings, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about a gift from the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, in Dream Interpretation of a dream about a gift from the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, in a dream that expresses kindness, God willing. If the dreamer sees the Prophet giving him a gift, it may lead to goodness that he receives it, and God knows best. When a married man sees the Prophet giving him a gift in a dream, this may be evidence of praiseworthy things, and God knows best. I know the unseen. Likewise, if a married woman sees the Prophet giving her a gift, this may indicate the good that she will receive, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the Messenger from afar in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the Messenger from afar in a dream. We did not find clear explanations for seeing the Messenger from afar, except that seeing The Messenger in a dream can be a sign of goodness, and God knows best. When you see the Messenger, he said, this indicates joy and happiness, God willing. If the dreamer sees the Prophet frowning, this may indicate anxiety, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the Prophet’s daughters in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the Prophet’s daughters in a dream can be a sign of goodness, and God knows best. It leads to marriage to a righteous woman, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees the Messenger’s daughters, it may indicate a righteous woman, and God knows best. If a married woman sees Fatima al-Zahra in a dream, this may be evidence of a person’s loss, and God knows the unseen. Some also mentioned that it could express goodness and happiness, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about hearing The voice of the Prophet Muhammad in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of hearing the voice of the Prophet Muhammad in a dream could be an indication of good news, and God knows the unseen. It can express receiving happy news, and God knows best. If the dreamer hears the voice of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, perhaps it is a sign of his repentance for sins, and God is Most High. And I know. It can also indicate goodness and happiness, God willing. Interpretation of a dream of hearing the sound of the Qur’an in the bathroom in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of hearing the sound of the Qur’an in the bathroom in a dream can indicate hypocrites, and God knows the unseen. And because it may express the betrayal of some hypocrites, God is also higher and more knowledgeable when If a single girl sees herself hearing the sound of the Qur’an in the bathroom, this could indicate problems and difficulties, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees herself hearing the sound of the Qur’an in a dream, this may be evidence of disagreements, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream of not being able to hear the Qur’an in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of not being able to hear the Qur’an in a dream. Hearing the Qur’an in a dream. Not being able to read the Qur’an may indicate that you are listening to songs, and God knows the unseen. Seeing an inability to

title: Messages of love, passion, love, romance, and manager

preview.html: Love letters, love, love, romance, managerLove letters, love, love, romance, boss How can we live without love letters? In all this, there are many logical values ​​that carry in themselves all the wonderful meanings. Love is the root of the essence of discipline and the foundation of poets' systems, as well as the rhythm of orators' prose. Love is the head of the subject and the foundation of passion and well-being. However, even poets cannot measure the extent of love that the heart can bear, and love remains a pure mystery that every human being expresses as he pleases.Love letters to womenMessages of love, adoration, love, romance and boss on your birthday My darling, I cannot express my feeling in my life. Today and every year you are the most beautiful, closest and sweetest lover in the world. My life is mine, my soul is mine, all your years are mine, and in my heart I put you here. I love you, my dear, with every word of the poets and every description of the speakers. Good evening and sweet dreams, in the rising moon that tells you what You want to know, I've never seen anyone but you. And I will never see anyone else from now on.Short love lettersThere are many feelings and emotions that affect the mind and heart, where love is one of the highest feelings that people feel towards each other, and love letters are just a simple way to express your feelings to your partner. No matter how different the languages ​​and dialects in which it is written or the eloquent meanings and feelings we desire, the topic will be a collection of the most prominent love letters to lovers and loved ones. Two novels.. I am in love and I am in love.. with love and gratitude.. Your love is filled with conscience. Short love letters, but they tell you that My love for you is not just a whim. I love you with every message. Love is like sand.. and your love is high. Your love is like a grain of sand. The most beautiful morning love messages. Messages of love, passion, love, romance, and director. I love you and love without limits.. Morning love to the queen of the universe and all things. Love messages written on the forehead.. Good morning and Jasmine.. Ali, the owner of the cheeks.. Morning love and longing for nostalgia. Morning Goodness to the queen of my heart and soul. I love you. Your love taught me the ABCs of boating. Your love taught me the paths of the planets. Morning love, wonders of the world. Your love is fast in my heart.. I think of you before I sleep.. I wake up with your love every day. Long love letters. Letters of love, adoration, love, and romance. The chief of love is the food of the poor, and I am the poorest of lovers. Love is the longing of lovers, and I am the first in love. Love is the meeting of hearts, and I am captivated by the longing to meet lovers. Love letters are a connected pulse between two hearts and a mutual feeling between two lovers. With your love, only the heart can reach all distances, break barriers and cross borders. But the point is not how far we are, but the satisfaction I feel in loving you. My faith in our love is eternal and unchanging... My heart sinks in the sea of ​​love and it hits me again and again. Love and love messages. Love is not without difficulties, because the process of meeting your loved ones is a difficult process and talking to them can be very difficult. I breathe your air and inhale your presence. I feel your love and the love that penetrates my heart. The warmth of your breath and your whispers make me fall in love. In my heart is your name and in my life is your love. In my mind is your love and in my mind is your falcon. If love is bitterness and fire, I will choose you with your love. If it collapses

title: Interpretation of a dream about snakes by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about snakes: Seeing snakes in a dream is an unfavorable sign and an indication of sadness and unpleasant news that the dreamer will hear in the coming period, in addition to the presence of enemies who want to destroy his life in various ways. Interpretation of a dream about snakes Seeing snakes in a dream is an unfavorable sign and a sign of unpleasant news that he will hear Dreamer. Seeing snakes in a dream symbolizes an unstable snake and the damage that a pregnant woman will suffer in the coming period. Seeing snakes in a dream means debts and crises that befall him. A dreamer who sees a lot of snakes in a dream is a sign of not achieving the goals that the dreamer seeks. It could be The presence of snakes in a dream is a sign of many of the dreamer’s enemies who are trying to destroy his life. Interpretation of a dream about snakes by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing snakes in a dream as unfavorable signs and sad news that the dreamer will hear. Seeing snakes in a dream is a sign of an unstable life and deteriorating condition. Psychological. The dreamer's dream about snakes indicates the presence of many enemies who want to destroy his life. Seeing snakes in a dream is a sign of not achieving the goals and aspirations that the person has been striving for for a long time. Seeing snakes in a dream symbolizes debts and poverty that are accumulating on the dreamer. Interpretation Dreaming of snakes for a single woman: Seeing snakes in a dream for an unmarried woman means sadness and worsening of the psychological situation in which she lives. A girl who sees snakes in a dream shows the problems and pressures that she faces at this time in her life. Seeing snakes in a dream is a sign of not achieving the goals and aspirations that you are seeking. Behind her for a long time. A girl’s dream of snakes indicates that she has bad friends accompanying her and she must stay away from them as soon as possible. Seeing snakes in an unmarried girl is a sign of her distance from God and the path of truth. Interpretation of a dream of snakes for a married woman. A married woman’s dream of snakes indicates an unstable life and problems Which she faces with her person at this time in her life. Seeing a lot of snakes in a married woman’s dream is evidence that she faces hatred and jealousy from some hypocrites around her and she must be very careful with them. Seeing snakes in a married woman’s dream indicates the wealth and debts that she has accumulated. The dream For a married woman to have snakes is an indication of failure to achieve the goals and ambitions that she has been pursuing for a long time. Interpretation of a dream about snakes for a pregnant woman: A pregnant woman seeing snakes in a dream is an unfavorable sign and an indication of negative events that she will face in the future. Seeing snakes in a dream by a woman Pregnant is an indication of the difficult period she is going through through pain and sadness. Also, a pregnant woman who sees snakes in a dream is a sign that the birth process will not be easy. A pregnant woman who sees snakes in a dream indicates that she is not receiving support from those close to her. The vision of the

title: Interpretation of the color white in a dream Seeing the color white in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The dream of the white color for the single woman, for the married woman, for the pregnant woman, for the divorced woman, for the man, whether the dress, shirt, trousers, skirt, in clothes, is the color of a white son. Interpretation of the color white in a dream. The color white in a dream depends on it because it indicates inner peace, security, stability, and evidence of purity, self-confidence, abilities, and energy. On the other hand, it is the color of vitality, calm, and peace, and when it dominates the dream, it shows calm and peace. As for the lack of clarity in the dream, it has a positive or neutral meaning, and bright white clothing is evidence of ability, energy, and drive towards life, and this color does not have any negative meaning at all. If the color dominates White on your dream, the message the dream is sending to you is related to emotion or feeling. White is the “master of colours” and no other color can exist without it, as the physics of optics has taught us. A person who sees the color white in his dream may realize that the current stage of his life is a period of peace, tranquility and purity, and therefore he is required to maintain this atmosphere and not disturb it with his negative thoughts. The white color in a dream expresses the pure feeling directed towards a specific person or group of people and expresses the purity of the soul. Sometimes the white color expresses loyalty and its symbols can be summarized with the following meanings: {Loyalty, honesty, generosity, love...}Seeing the white color in The dream means self-satisfaction, purity, self-confidence, and not giving in to difficulties. The color white indicates calm and tranquility in the event that the dream is overwhelming. The person who sees in a dream that he is wearing white clothes, his vision shows his strength and ability to achieve his goals in life. Interpretation of a dream about the white color in clothes and apparel. Related The white dress has been associated with the idea of ​​purity and chastity since ancient times. The white dress in a dream expresses the dreamer’s spiritual and emotional harmony with his environment and society. Whoever sees in his dream that he is wearing white clothes, in reality he has a clean and healthy mind, and the white color on the shirt, for example, indicates good health or recovery. The white dress In the vision, it is praiseworthy, because it expresses dignity, character, lover of what is good, true and correct. Interpretation of the color white in the dream of a single and married man. The white color in any person’s dream especially symbolizes his optimistic vision of the future. If the color is white in the dress or the dress and the white car in the dream of the single person It symbolizes the right and healthy path. As for the white color in a married man’s dream, it reflects the state of family harmony in the family and it is the color of nourishment if seen on furniture, curtains, and household belongings. The white color in this context symbolizes love as a fixed value that characterized the relationship between a husband and his wife, and perhaps it indicates The white color on the quilt, cover, or bed refers to a loyal and obedient wife. Interpretation of seeing white in an unmarried girl’s dream. The white color in a single girl’s or girl’s dream is associated with passion or noble feelings. The girl whose dream was overshadowed by the white color is actually living a special and distinct emotional stage. The color can be The white one

title: Interpretation of a dream about a child in the bathroom

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a child in a bathroom in a dream.Interpretation of a dream about a child in a bathroom in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about a child in a bathroom in a dream We did not find specific interpretations to see thatHowever, if a single girl sees a child falling into the bathroom, it may be a sign that she is falling in love with a bad man, And God knows best. Where he can express his desire to destroy her, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. In the event that the dreamer sees a small child, this can be evidence of goodness and survival, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream of a Christian girl in a dream. Interpretation of dreams for a Christian girl in a dream. Seeing a Christian girl can indicate distance. About goodness and religion, and God is All-Knowing. If the dreamer sees a Christian girl in a dream, this may be evidence of his distance from religion, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. If the dreamer sees a Christian girl in a dream, then he can express kindness and happiness, and God knows best. It could also indicate that the dreamer is notified of repentance from disobedience and sins. And God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream of a little girl talking in a cradle in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of a little girl talking in a cradle in a dream could be an indication of the necessity of the truth appearing in one of them, and God knows the unseen. It may also indicate alerting the dreamer to remove injustice, and God knows best, in case the dreamer sees A little girl talking in the cradle, this may indicate his good condition, God willing. Like a little girl talking in the cradle, it may mean that she is getting rid of worries, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream of a little girl sleeping in my arms in a dream. Interpretation of dreams of a little girl sleeping in my arms in a dream could be hugging a little girl. A sign of kindness, as it can express the achievement of goals, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When you see an unmarried girl hugging a little girl in a dream, this may indicate excellence in studies, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees him hugging a little girl, this may lead to healing, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream of a little girl crying in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of a little girl. A little girl crying in a dream could be a sign of bad things, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. Whereas if the dreamer sees a little girl crying in a dream, this may be evidence of the dreamer’s sadness, and God knows the unseen. Seeing a child crying in a dream could indicate bad news, and God knows the unseen as well. The situation is that if the dreamer sees a little girl crying in a dream, then he has material rulings, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream that my child has a boy in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my son having a boy in a dream may mean that the girl will be exposed to a problem or scandal, and God knows the unseen. When the dreamer sees his daughter having a boy, which may indicate If he sees his daughter turning into a boy, this may mean that she has reached a prominent position and a great position in her work, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about raping my child in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about raping my child in a dream. Raping a child could be a sign of committing sins and transgressions, and God knows the unseen. Seeing children being raped in a dream indicates wrong actions that a person takes to harm others, and God knows the unseen. Seeing a familiar child being raped may indicate psychological crises that he is going through.

If the dreamer sees him hugging a little girl, this may lead to healing, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream of a little girl crying in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of a little girl. A little girl crying in a dream could be a sign of bad things, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. Whereas if the dreamer sees a little girl crying in a dream, this may be evidence of the dreamer’s sadness, and God knows the unseen. Seeing a child crying in a dream could indicate bad news, and God knows the unseen as well. The situation is that if the dreamer sees a little girl crying in a dream, then he has material rulings, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream that my child has a boy in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my son having a boy in a dream may mean that the girl will be exposed to a problem or scandal, and God knows the unseen. When the dreamer sees his daughter having a boy, which may indicate If he sees his daughter turning into a boy, this may mean that she has reached a prominent position and a great position in her work, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about raping my child in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about raping my child in a dream. Raping a child could be a sign of committing sins and transgressions, and God knows the unseen. Seeing children being raped in a dream indicates wrong actions that a person takes to harm others, and God knows the unseen. Seeing a familiar child being raped may indicate psychological crises that he is going through.

title: Learn about the 50 most important interpretations of a broken phone screen in a dream for individuals

preview.html: Interpretation of a broken phone screen in a dream for a single woman: The breaking of the phone screen or other modern communication devices was not known before in the time of Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi and other dream interpretation scholars, but we will mention what was mentioned in the interpretations of visions of ancient means of communication between people and the clues that could occur from While seeing the phone screen shattering. Seeing a phone or a mobile phone crashing in a dream. The mobile phone is one of the media that connects people to each other, whether they are family members, friends, or even people we do not know but need to contact for work, study, or personal interests. Therefore, we find that seeing a phone hanging in a dream could be a sign of tensions in social relationships. A girl may see this vision and find that she is a failure in her relationship with someone she loves and wants to communicate with, and the reason for the failure may be the inequality between the two sides. As for a woman, perhaps Her vision indicates the severance of the marital relationship as a result of ongoing disputes, or that she is losing her relationship with a friend who was closest to her, but there is a major problem that has arisen that has led to this. The estrangement between them. As for the man who sees this vision, he may experience a loss in his work or trade, which will make him feel very anxious and sad. Interpretation of a dream about a phone screen shattering by Ibn Sirin. As we mentioned previously, the phone was not a means of communication in the past, but we will count Ibn Sirin’s sayings about Visions of communication between people in the past. If the viewer is trying to enter into a partnership with a person at the present time, which keeps them in constant contact with each other in the recent period, then the vision indicates the presence of an acute conflict between the two partners, which may lead to dissolving the aforementioned partnership. , whether in its infancy or for some time. The dreamer may fail to achieve a certain ambition in his life as a result of his negligence in taking the necessary steps to achieve it. It is not only desires that create the future, but hard work is required to achieve them. The vision shows some people who are suffering from a serious crisis in their lives. Their lives, but unfortunately no one tries to contact them and work to help them solve these problems, and they may actually resort to some friends or family who deceive him by giving him help. His hand and help him until he overcomes his crisis. The vision may indicate the feeling of extreme loneliness that the dreamer feels as a result of being exposed to a psychological crisis in which no one helped him. Interpretation of a broken phone screen in a dream for a single woman: If this vision is seen by a girl who has not yet married and is of marriageable age, this is evidence of tension. In her relationship with her lover who was waiting for her engagement. If she is engaged, it may be a sign of problems between the engaged couple, which may eventually lead to separation if the screen is completely broken. But if the girl drops the phone and it does not break, it may be an indication for her of some disagreements. Which will cause a conflict between her and someone she loves, but she will be able to overcome it early and go out on a romantic date. He is preparing to meet the

title: Interpretation of a dream about a big gorilla for a married woman, according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a large gorilla for a married woman. Interpretation by Ibn Sirin. A large gorilla is a brutal, attacking predator whose reaction when it sees a human cannot be predicted. Although most species of monkeys are intelligent, there are many types, including aggressive dreams such as a large gorilla. One of the most frightening dreams is seeing A gorilla in a dream and facing it closely or being harmed because of it. In this article we will learn together about the interpretation of a dream about a gorilla. A large gorilla for a married woman. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about a large gorilla. The well-known dream interpreter Muhammad Ibn Sirin presented in his book The Interpretation of Dreams several different interpretations of seeing a large gorilla. . The most important thing about seeing a large gorilla, which has sparked controversy, can be determined through the following: Ibn Sirin interpreted the dream of seeing a large gorilla in a dream in general, the death of blessings for the dreamer and his exposure to major financial problems that may lead him to poverty, and it may also indicate that the dreamer A dream is a deceptive quality, or characterized by deception and cunning. Ibn Sirin interpreted the dream of fighting with a large gorilla, and this indicates that the dreamer is ill for a temporary period, but he quickly recovers from this illness, especially if the dreamer defeats the large gorilla, but if the opposite happens Ibn Sirin interpreted the dream of receiving a monkey or a large gorilla as a gift, as this indicates that the dreamer was exposed to fraud and theft. Ibn Sirin interpreted the dream of eating the meat of a gorilla or a monkey. Large, as an indication that the dreamer will suffer from major problems, as well as worries and sorrows, or he may suffer from serious diseases, as he interpreted. . the dream. Such as taking money illegally. Ibn Sirin interpreted the dream of hunting a large gorilla as a sign of the benevolence of the great magician. Ibn Sirin interpreted the dream of marrying a large gorilla or a monkey, as this indicates that the dreamer committed great sins. Ibn Sirin interpreted the dream of a large gorilla that was bitten by A large gorilla is evidence that the dreamer is exposed to major problems and disagreements with his family and relatives. Ibn Sirin confirmed that seeing a large gorilla or a monkey in bed indicates differences in marital life that lead to separation or divorce. Interpretation of seeing a large gorilla in a dream for a married woman. Interpreters have confirmed Dreams: Seeing a big gorilla in an unmarried girl’s dream means a cunning, deceitful, and deceitful young man or woman asking her to marry, but his intention is to deceive her like the dream. Everyone who sees a large gorilla in a dream interprets it as a man without blood and morals or marries a man, but he is affected by anxiety, sadness, anger and destruction. Interpretation of seeing a monkey in a dream for a married womanDream interpreters agreed that seeing a large gorilla in a married woman’s dream means her marriage to a man characterized by deception and cunning. And greedy, but he shows piety and loyalty in front of people, but inside he is a distinguished person. With hatred, resentment, and enmity. Interpretation of seeing a big gorilla in a dream for a pregnant woman. Many believe that seeing a big gorilla in a dream is okay.

title: Pigeons in a dream and the interpretation of a dream about a dead pigeon in a dream

preview.html: Bathing in a dream: One of the dreams that portend goodness and happiness is that the dove symbolizes peace and tranquility. Not only that, but the dove is a good food that tastes wonderful, and interpreters have confirmed that the correct interpretation of the vision is based on the narrator. Narration. Bathing in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a dove, in the event that you see two of them, indicates the emergence of a strong emotional relationship with a life partner. While seeing a flock of connected pigeons, the vision becomes an indicator of the need to shed light on emotional life and not neglect. As for seeing a dove In a dream, the dreamer feels sorry, this indicates that there are deceitful people in his life who are planning tricks and tricks against him, so he needs to recalculate and get rid of their presence in his personal circle. While seeing a dove walking in a dream means that the dreamer must be careful, because the dream foretells that he is hearing news. Bad and that when God says I dreamed of pigeons flying away, the vision becomes a sign of financial loss and bankruptcy. Bathing in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin explained that the dove in a dream flies and heads towards the dreamer and sits on his shoulder or in his hands as a sign of goodness, grace, and the nearness of hearing good news. As for the bird Which flies away from the dreamer in a dream, indicates being exposed to a state of failure or loss. Slaughtering pigeons in a dream according to Ibn Sirin indicates that the dreamer often speaks badly about those around him, and he delves into the symptoms of girls and women. Seeing a married man flowing on A pigeon in a dream is a sign of promotion at work and obtaining a prestigious position, which increases his status and salary. As for an unmarried man and the appearance of a pigeon in his dream, it is happy news of his marriage to a girl with good origins and morals, whose presence in his life will change him for the better on all levels. Bathing in a dream by Imam Al-SadiqImam Al-Sadiq says that a dove in a dream is a relief from their distress and an end to their stress. While the appearance of a flock of pigeons in the patient’s life is a sign of recovery, and if the dreamer is in debt, the vision becomes good news of repaying the debt. As for the dream of a dove in the dream of a young woman, Married, it indicates her marriage to a man of repute and good character. Also, the appearance of a single dove in a man or woman’s dream is a sign that you are hearing news about a person who has been absent for a period of time. Bathing in a dream for a single woman. The presence or vision of a dove in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates On her marriage to a good person with a good reputation, good morals and generosity, and the entry of a flock of doves into the home of an unmarried woman in a dream indicates the approaching promotion at work or her success in studies, and in both cases she reaches the highest levels and her life changes radically. Slaughtering one dove in A dream is an unwanted vision that warns that he will fall into a serious crisis or distress. It also indicates that he has made a mistake or committed a sin and eating it makes the interpretation of a dream about a pigeon for an unmarried woman a warning about what you are doing to her in terms of symptoms and talking about bad friends and those around her. Pigeons

title: Learn about the interpretation of the living shroud in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The shroud of the living in dreamsThe shroud is the white garment in which a person is placed after his death, and the world of dreams contains many things that may happen to a person in reality or may come from his subconscious mind, so in this article we will learn about the interpretation of seeing the shroud and the clues that point to it. The shroud of the living in a dream Ibn Sirin: What is the interpretation of a living shroud in a dream? Interpretation of a dream about a living shroud who committed many sins and evils and saw himself wearing it with his lust and complete will. If the dreamer sees in a dream a shroud and a funeral accompanied by lamentations and screams, then this vision does not bode well and indicates that the dreamer will be exposed to many of his worries. In the coming days. Seeing a young man sewing a shroud to wear, but he did not wear it, is a sign of his urgent desire to repent, but he does not do so. A specialized Egyptian website that includes a team of the best dream and vision translators in the Arab world. To access it, type Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site on Google. The shroud of the living in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin says that the dreamer’s vision that his father was completely wrapped, and after that the dreamer was covered, this vision does not bode well and indicates the approaching death of his father, and after a period of time the fortuneteller will die Also. Ibn Sirin said that if the dreamer is happy while he is wrapped and the shroud does not cover him completely, then this dream is desirable and symbolizes the dreamer’s good condition and a change in his circumstances for the better. If one sees in a dream that someone is offering to wear the shroud, but the dreamer strongly rejects this matter, then The dream has good repercussions, as it is a sign that the dreamer refuses to commit sins and abominations, no matter how. He is exposed to pressure and temptation, and indicates his relationship with the immoral person who commits major sins, adultery, and staying away from him. A living shroud in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a pure white shroud in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates her livelihood and goodness in her next life. And if he sees the shroud stained with blood, this does not bode well. It indicates that he will face many difficulties and crises in the coming days and that he will live in harsh circumstances. If she sees that her father in a dream is trying to end her and she is dissatisfied, then the vision indicates that her father controls all matters of her life and that she has no right to express what is inside her and that she you will do. He got married. For someone who does not want her. When she sees herself taking off the shroud that she was wearing against her will, this means that she will revolt against her family’s behavior towards her and express her opinion about her life and be freed from all restrictions. A living shroud in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who sees her husband covering her against her will, screams and cries. Loudly, a sign that she is unhappy in her married life and does not love her husband, and that he is an arrogant and unjust person who treats her. Badly. If she sees herself dead and a member of her family covers her, the dream indicates that she is committing many sins and wrong deeds and that this person will cover her and not reveal her secret. If she sees herself wearing a shroud, but it is full of decorations and colors, this indicates that she is fascinated by things. worldly, and she must accept

title: Interpretation of a dream about a funeral according to Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Seeing a funeral in a dream means that the funeral is after the death of a person, and it is a path to the grave, where all family members, friends and acquaintances left him. Dreaming about a funeral is a frightening matter, and here are the most important interpretations of seeing a funeral in a dream: Interpretation of seeing a funeral in a dream for a woman. If a married woman sees that she has died and is pregnant in a coffin, then the interpretation of the dream is that she is bad in religion or that she is corrupt and does not fear God, Blessed and Most High. But if an unmarried woman sees what She died and they carried her in the coffin. The interpretation of the dream is that he will get married soon. But if the pregnant woman sees that she died and her funeral took place, but the one who carried the coffin reminded her with good words in the interpretation of the dream that she will give birth safely and her child is in good health. The funeral in the man’s dream. Whoever saw in a dream that he died and there was no one to carry him. In the interpretation of the dream, the sleeper may be exposed to imprisonment, for example, or loneliness in general. As for the one who dreams that he is praying at a funeral or walking in it, the interpretation of the dream is that he will meet new people in his life, but they are of a high degree of kindness and religiosity. As for the one who sees in his dream that he is walking At the funeral of someone he knows who is carrying his coffin, the meaning of the dream is that the sleeper is eating from forbidden money, and he often eats from the dead person’s money in the dream. But if the sleeper sees that the funeral is being held in the middle of the markets, for example, then the funeral in the dream here indicates that the market has a lot of people. Sellers who want and deceive weight and balance. Interpretation of the meaning of seeing a funeral. Whoever sees in his dream that there are many funerals in one place, the funerals here tend to be due to the fact that the people of this place practice many forbidden things, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a funeral flying in the air. This dream is considered one of the dreams Very common among people, a funeral in the air or hanging in the air usually indicates someone who is ready to die, those who have great influence in the state. We have shown you a number of interpretations of seeing a funeral in a dream, which does not necessarily indicate death, separation, or farewell, but the funeral Sometimes it brings food, kindness, victory, or journey.
